nodes.bodyText: Since this is the value at instantiation should this be NONE here?

Suppose so. I only added the NONE type as I needed the zero based ordinal to allow clean DB backfills in the update scripts, to be honest. An evaluation's status shoud either be USER or GROUP, never anything else.
I removed the NONE enum  and made the column nullable, with a default on the bean of USER. This seems to make sense to me.
